title: Worms Armageddon
notes: null deref. using the wine workarounds the game provides, it draws a tiny black window in a virtual desktop

title: Worms Armageddon
notes: At installation it notices you are using wine and asks if you want to set some settings to make it more compatble, when you say no it wont run, When i say yes it installs fine I guess you can play, and it runs stable, But it refuses to go in full screen, no matter what settings you provide. if you move the window the game stays in spot, very hard to explain. you can move the window back to see the game again, my guess it is an easy fix, but changing the wrong setting  makes it stop running.

title: Worms Armageddon
notes: Crashes instantly, with or without applying suggested wine workarounds on startup.

Warnings about running game as administrator on launch.  Menu screens don't align with viewport unless the window is moved to the upper-left of the screen.  Changing rendering settings and restarting cause the screen to go black (can be fixed with regedit).  Otherwise plays fine, and application goes fullscreeen when starting a game.
systemInfoNotes: Specific model of video card is XFX Radeon HD 5850 Black Edition
title: Worms Armageddon

notes: Warning about running as Administrator, and then a virtual desktop with a small black rectangle in the middle.
title: Worms Armageddon

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Menus are messed up, but game overall is playable. To get into the game you have to allow it to install wine compatibility settings (asks after 1st run, you might need to reinstall), and then after Wine virtual desktop appears, move the window to TOP LEFT corner of the screen. Black rectangle is a dialogue box, with "ok" located in the middle bottom part (not that hard to click). Menus always render from left top corner of the screen, so you need to have the window there.
title: Worms Armageddon

notes: It works... sort of. The graphics are on a fixed part of the screen (upper left) and moving the window away from that corner makes the game... well, disappear. The mouse does not track accurately at all.
title: Worms Armageddon
